Html: I am developing an application in VB.NET. I want to check from this application whether any audio is currently being played by the sound card or not. Would I be able to do this using NAudio?  I tried all the existing code available but was not successful in achieving this. It would be really helpful to get some clues or code that will direct me. I am using VB.NET, .NET 2.0 and Windows Vista.

you might find that some of the CoreAudio API wrappers will let you do what you want, although I have not tried this personally

Mark
